alert.name: Nodes in Not Ready State alert

panels.description: Detect NotReady, DiskPressure, MemoryPressure, and PIDPressure conditions on kubelet for Schedulable nodes
panels.title: Node State

targets.expr: sum by (node) ((instance:node_load1_per_cpu:ratio) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:) and sum by (node) (cluster:master_nodes)

alert.name: CPU Utilization by Compute Node alert

targets.expr: sum by (node) ((instance:node_load1_per_cpu:ratio) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:) unless sum by (node) (cluster:master_nodes)
sum by (node) ((instance:node_memory_utilisation:ratio) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:) and sum by (node) (cluster:master_nodes)

alert.name: Memory Utilization by Compute Node alert

targets.expr: sum by (node) ((instance:node_memory_utilisation:ratio) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:) unless sum by (node) (cluster:master_nodes)

sum by (node) ((irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{job="node-exporter",device!~"veth.+"}[1m])) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:) and (sum by (node) (cluster:master_nodes))

sum by (node) ((irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="node-exporter",device!~"veth.+"}[1m])) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:) and (sum by (node) (cluster:master_nodes))

sum by (node) ((irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{job="node-exporter",device!~"veth.+"}[1m])) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:) unless (sum by (node) (cluster:master_nodes))

sum by (node) ((irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="node-exporter",device!~"veth.+"}[1m])) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:) unless (sum by (node) (cluster:master_nodes))
sum by (node) (rate(node_network_receive_errs_total{device!~"veth.+",job="node-exporter"}[2m]) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:)
sum by (node) (rate(node_network_transmit_errs_total{device!~"veth.+",job="node-exporter"}[2m]) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:)

((node_nf_conntrack_entries) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:) / ((node_nf_conntrack_entries_limit) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:)

panels.description: Only display nodes with large NTP offset
panels.title: Node NTP Offset

panels.description: Display busiest device (highest I/O) for each server

targets.expr: sum by (node) (irate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{job="node-exporter",device=~"nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+"}[1m]) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:)

panels.title: Disk I/O Utilization

targets.expr:
max by (instance, namespace, pod, device) ((node_filesystem_size_bytes{fstype=~"ext[234]|btrfs|xfs|zfs", mountpoint!="/boot"}
- node_filesystem_avail_bytes{fstype=~"ext[234]|btrfs|xfs|zfs", mountpoint!="/boot"})
/ node_filesystem_size_bytes{fstype=~"ext[234]|btrfs|xfs|zfs", mountpoint!="/boot"})* on (namespace, pod) group_left(node)
node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:

alert.name: Cluster Pod Requests and Limits alert

panels.description: Kubernetes schedules based on CPU and memory pod requests

targets.expr: sum(sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace!~"(default|kube|openshift).*"}) and count (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Running|Pending|Unknown"} == 1) by (pod)) / sum (machine_cpu_cores)

sum(sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace!~"(default|kube|openshift).*"}) and count (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Running|Pending|Unknown"} == 1) by (pod)) / sum (machine_cpu_cores)

panels.title: Cluster Pod Requests and Limits

panels.description: Containers in cluster by state, excluding Running and Completed pod status
panels.title: Waiting and Terminated Containers

panels.description: Latency of Docker, runtime, network, pod worker, and cgroup manager operations averaged across application nodes
panels.title: Kubelet Operations Latency

targets.expr: 100 * sort_desc(sum (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) / sum (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace))
